page.title: 06WALSDEN Industry
page.content: The industries which are in Walsden now include some{textile {manufacturers,}a{cloth printing {company,}a{garden centre,}a{labelling {company, furniture manufacturers,}a {foundry,}a{coal merchant}etc. The two largest employers are the cloth printers, which have existed for fifty years and employs 138 people and a very popular garden centre, established in 1945 and employing 75 people. The people in charge of the firms in Walsden identify the main {advantages}of having premises here as, it is a good place in the {communication system;}it is close to the{motorway network}and within easy reach of{large industrial areas}such as Manchester and Bradford.
